chat.msg: Welcome!
Ok from x your going to go left underneath the rock that the tiger is above

Got it. I am currently at the starting point. I will go left underneath the rock that the tiger is above. 

I am now at the small island with the tiger on it. What should I do next?
You're going to continue to move left go across the stick and over the parrots head go through trees and go right and cross over the three rocks.

Okay, I moved left from the starting point and saw the small island with the tiger on it. Then, I crossed over the tiger's head and reached the big island on the south-west where I saw the parrot sitting on the tree. Can you please guide me again on how to proceed from there?
Go to the bottom right and cross over the three rocks
Got it! I am now moving towards the south-east of the parrot and I can see three rocks leading to a new island with a frog on it. Should I cross over those rocks to reach the frog?
Yes
Okay, I crossed over the rocks and reached the new island with the frog. From here, I can see a crocodile on my left and the same big island with the elephant on my left again. Where should I go now?
Go under the from than turn left.  Cross over the crocodile.

Thanks for guiding me! I am now moving left from the frog and crossed under the frog to reach the crocodile. I am now crossing over the crocodile to reach the same big island with the elephant. What's next?
Okay, after you cross over the crocodile, cross of the black rock that is underneath the elephant. Than cross of the 2 rocks that are left of the elephant.
Alright, I crossed over the crocodile and now moving left to the elephant. There are three rocks in total underneath the elephant, which one should I cross first?
Cross the black rock first and cross the 2 light grey rocks next.  They're on the left.

Thank you for the guidance! I crossed over the black rock that was underneath the elephant and then moved left to cross the two light grey rocks. I'm now at the left of the elephant. What should I do next?
Go underneath the giraffe and make a right and cross over the snake.

I understand. I am now moving down from the elephant to reach the giraffe and then I'll go under the giraffe to make a right. From there, I can see the snake on the south-east of the giraffe. I'll cross over the snake to proceed further. Please let me know what my next step would be.
Than go to the treassure box you've make to the check point

Understood. I just crossed over the snake and finally reached the treasure box. I have now completed the path that you guided me through and reached the endpoint to see a treasure box. Thank you for guiding me!

chat.msg: Welcome!
Ok, start with the Dalmatian and move left.
I see the white dog. Moving left from it doesn't lead anywhere. Could you please give me another instruction?
Start with the white dog and go left.
Got it! I see another white dog sitting close to a red and white picnic carpet. Is that where we should go next?
Yes
Great! We are now next to the white dog and the picnic carpet. Where should we go from here?
Cross the log
I'm sorry, but I don't see a log on the map. Could you please give me another instruction?
pass the blue berries
I didn't mention the blueberries before, but I think you are referring to the wooden branch. Got it! We passed the wooden branch and we are now facing north-west. What's the next step?
Make a right and go around the bush
Sorry, I don't see any bushes on the map. Could you please give me another instruction?
go to the right get on the path and make a left
Got it! We are now heading towards the florist stand, after which there is a bridge. What's the next step?
cross the brigde
Great! We are now on the bridge. Is there any specific direction we should go after crossing the bridge?
cross the bridge and walk by the tree branch
I'm sorry, but I don't see a tree branch on the map. Could you please give me another instruction?
cross the bridge and make a left
Understood! After crossing the bridge, we took a left and saw two old people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Where should we go next?
Keep straight.  Before you get the bush make a left.
I'm sorry, but I don't see any bushes on the map. Could you please give me another instruction?
before you get to the tree make a left
Understood! We turned left before reaching the tree. Now, we are facing south-east, and I can see a brown deer. Is that where we should go next?
Yes
Great! We have reached the brown deer. *Finished!*

chat.msg: Welcome!
Start at the tent and go south
Okay! From the tent, I see the dog sitting left of the fire and to the right of the fire is a red mushroom and south of it is a blue car. Now I am heading south. What should I do next?
Keep moving south and by the blue car go towards the telescope
Great! Now I see the blue telescope. Should I keep moving south, or turn to the left of the telescope?
Turn left of the telescope
Alright, now I turned left of the telescope. I can see some rocks surrounding a wooden house on my left. Should I head towards them?
Yes
Now I am heading towards the rocks surrounding the wooden house. I can see the house in front of me. Did I reach the final destination?
Yes
Great! So I did it. I reached the wooden house *finished*. Thank you for guiding me in this adventure!
